channel.title: Business / Tech Culture on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Business / Tech Culture on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang Is Bananas for Google Gemini’s AI Image Generator
item.description: The Nvidia CEO reveals his consuming love for Google’s image generator, the artsy side of Grok, and what exactly he uses Perplexity, Gemini, and ChatGPT for right now.

item.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang Is Bananas for Google Gemini’s AI Image Generator
item.description: The Nvidia CEO reveals his consuming love for Google’s image generator, the artsy side of Grok, and what exactly he uses Perplexity, Gemini, and ChatGPT for right now.

item.title: I Wasn’t Sure I Wanted Anthropic to Pay Me for My Books—I Do Now
item.description: Anthropic agreed to a $1.5 billion settlement for authors whose books were used to train its AI model. As an author who fits that description, I’ve come around to the idea.

item.title: I Wasn’t Sure I Wanted Anthropic to Pay Me for My Books—I Do Now
item.description: Anthropic agreed to a $1.5 billion settlement for authors whose books were used to train its AI model. As an author who fits that description, I’ve come around to the idea.

item.description: Tune into Uncanny Valley’s first live show in San Francisco on September 9, featuring special guest Jack Conte, CEO of Patreon.

item.title: The Doomers Who Insist AI Will Kill Us All
item.description: Eliezer Yudkowsky, AI’s prince of doom, explains why computers will kill us and provides an unrealistic plan to stop it.

item.title: Astronomer’s New CEO Speaks—Yes, About That
item.description: The viral kiss-cam moment could be the best thing that’s ever happened to Astronomer. But its new CEO won’t say that.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Panicking About Zohran Mamdani. NYC’s Tech Scene Is Not
item.description: New York City tech leaders aren’t rattled by the prospect of a Mayor Mamdani. In fact, many of them welcome it.

item.title: The Kryptos Key Is Going Up for Sale
item.description: Jim Sanborn is auctioning off the elusive solution to K4, the outdoor sculpture that sits at CIA headquarters.

item.title: Inside Jeffrey Epstein’s Forgotten AI Summit
item.description: Long before ChatGPT, a group of AI luminaries gathered on an island to discuss the future of artificial intelligence. Their funder ultimately cast a shadow on all who attended.

item.title: Trump’s Anti-Bias AI Order Is Just More Bias
item.description: The Trump administration says it wants AI models free from ideological bias, as it pressures their developers to reflect the president’s worldview.

item.title: Trump’s Anti-Bias AI Order Is Just More Bias

item.title: How WIRED Analyzed the Epstein Video
item.description: On this episode of Uncanny Valley, we dive into the differences between what the US government said about a Jeffrey Epstein video it released and the story told by its metadata.

item.title: How WIRED Analyzed the Epstein Video

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg Is Expanding His Secretive Hawaii Compound. Part of It Sits Atop a Burial Ground
item.description: Meta’s CEO has become one of the biggest landowners in Hawaii, growing his property’s footprint and erecting new mysterious buildings.

item.title: Microsoft and OpenAI's AGI Fight Is Bigger Than a Contract
item.description: A key clause in Microsoft and OpenAI’s deal embodies the raging divide between AGI true believers and those who think it’s still a long ways off.
